rows.label: qev087701_MSG0001
rows.name: It's a Wrothian soldier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0002
rows.name: Nnngh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0003
rows.name: Wh-who are you...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0004
rows.name: We're humans. From Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0005
rows.name:
Our two races are allies now.
I hope you'll consider us friends as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0006
rows.name: Nopon are also friends with kitty comrades![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0007
rows.name: What happened here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0008
rows.name: Ganglion stragglers...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0009
rows.name: Meh-meh! Why are nasties so nasty?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0010
rows.name:
I am Ni Zain, a warrior of the Wrothian people.
Would you hear my request?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0011
rows.name: Of course. We'll help however we can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0012
rows.name: Please then, help His Highness. Help Prince Jiarg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0013
rows.name: Prince Jiarg? Oh! Angry kitty-captain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0014
rows.name: I expect you know we served the Ganglion for a time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0015
rows.name:
During that period,
they demanded we offer up one of our Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'm not surprised.
Wrothian Skells are some of the fastest around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0017
rows.name:
Yes, and they continue to employ
replicas of that Skell as we speak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0018
rows.name:
His Highness set out to destroy them
and wash clean this blemish to our honor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0019
rows.name: But you were overpowered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0020
rows.name:
We were ambushed. Our squad was scattered, and I...
Well, it is as you see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0021
rows.name: But I don't expect all that stopped the prince.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0022
rows.name: No kidding. He'd probably charge in alone if it came to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0023
rows.name:
Ga Jiarg is the one who agreed to
take a chance on the peace treaty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0024
rows.name: We won't let him fight alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0025
rows.name: You have my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0026
rows.name:
This is where the Skells are being stored.
Please, you must hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0027
rows.name: Are friends going to leave hurt kitty cat all alone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_JNK0010
rows.name: Abandon

rows.label: qev087701_SEL0011
rows.name: Claim that saving Ga Jiarg is more important.

rows.label: qev087701_JNK0020
rows.name: Aid

rows.label: qev087701_SEL0021
rows.name: Insist that Ni Zain needs immediate medical attention.

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0028
rows.name: Yes. Please...hurry to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0029
rows.name: Butâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0030
rows.name:
No. This man needs medical attention.
We're taking him to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0031
rows.name: Right. We need to help him first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0032
rows.name: Your kindness is appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0033
rows.name:
But I have already...called for aid.
Go help His Highness. Please...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0034
rows.name: All right. Leave him to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0035
rows.name: Th-thank you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087701_MSG0036
rows.name: Let's get moving.[ST:wait ]
